reviewText: The dvds were shipped fast but License to drive had a scratch on it which is the only reason I bought this set. It still played ok so I kept it. Over all this was a good buy.

The best of these 3 movies is License To Drive,very funny and very 80's. Then the second one is Mischief with a well done back to the 50's. But Moving Violations is the very worst of all,I did not laugh once. Nothing can be perfect. But the low cost of this 3 pack DVD,was worth it anyway.

Here tis' Includes the 80's classcs: "Licence To Drive", "Moving Violations" and "Mischief" in one great money saving package!!!,it's cheaper than buying the 3 titles individually!!! Quite a bargain for the $$$!!! And there from Anchor Bay so you're getting top notch quality!!! Two thumbs up!!! Five stars!!! A+
